description: CSS file for styling the React Tic Tac Toe frontend, including theme management, responsive design, and animations.

classes.name: .App
classes.description: Main container for the app with centered content and dynamic background color.

classes.name: .App-logo
classes.description: Logo of the app with animation applied when prefers-reduced-motion is no-preference.

classes.name: .App-header
classes.description: Header section of the app containing layout and styling for the app's main header.

classes.name: .theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between themes, styled for visibility and interaction.
